resources.string: Find the right herbal solution for your health!
Just answer a few questions about your symptoms, and we\'ll recommend the most suitable herbs to support your body\'s health naturally. Start testing now and find the right herbs for your needs!

Bawang abang mirah (Aceh)
Pia (Batak)
Bawang abang (Palembang)
Bawang sirah, bambang sirah, dasun merah (Minangkabau)
...
Annual herb, no stems. The single leaf hugs the layered tuber. The tubers are thick and fleshy...
• Cough • Irregular menstruation • Diabetes • Worm medicine • Fever in children (external medicine) • Flatulence in children (external medicine)
Essential oils, cycloalin, methylalin, dihydroalin, flavonglycosides, quercetin...
Select one of the symptom categories you are experiencing, and we will help you find the right herbs for your health needs.
To help us provide more appropriate herbal recommendations, please select the specific symptoms you are experiencing from the pre-selected categories.
Congratulations, the results of your herbal recommendations are out!

Keep in mind, although herbs have health benefits, their use must still be wise and according to recommendations. If you have certain health conditions or are undergoing treatment, consult a medical professional before using this herb.

HerbaMate is a mobile application designed to provide herbal plant recommendations based on the symptoms experienced by the user, as well as providing detailed information about the herbal plants. This application aims to help people find alternative treatment solutions by utilizing the potential of herbal plants as traditional medicine. HerbaMate\'s main features include symptom-based recommendations, herbal plant search, and complete information on the benefits and how to use herbal plants. With HerbaMate, users can access safer and more reliable natural treatment solutions.
Let\'s find the right herbs for the symptoms of the disease you are experiencing!
